title: Ready for a creative shift?
text: Paving the paths on streamlining goodness with creativity in making simplistic and meaningful uses of tech via inclusive solution designs, projects, and activities that are always kept-open for public participation and use. We believe planetary resilience could be gained via creative disruptions and sustaining the ability to organize, empowering individuals to take initiative, start and join ongoing decision-making processes; in a non-anthropocentric manner. With all respect; "a future, made collective."
